title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. In JDK 1.4, there are obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) that are being displayed in the Open Type dialog.
OB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) are appearing prominently in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) should be less prominent in the Open Type dialog.
SR: 1. Launch the application. 2. Open the Type dialog. 3. Observe that the obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) appear prominently.
